title: Photo evidence of troll
body:
Blanked out name (no name and shame)
THIS WAS IN RANKED, go evidence of this guy. And the un-blanked name photos.
Please someone help me get this guy off the rift.
We are all sick of trolls and feeders in ranked

replies.body: I am with you man , this happened to me yesterday and I lost my promos your silver . Trolling in ranked is sad it ruins the game for everyone.

Thank you for respecting the universal rules. But this is still not the correct way to report other players.

Make a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) instead with your evidence. Hopefully the red will look into this case.

Best of luck.
